content.rendered:
Just like on your laptop, if you delete a file, it will go straight to Dumpster’s Recycle Bin where you can restore it if needed. It’s an easy way to restore any file that you accidentally delete!

You can preview any of your files in Dumpster. The Recycle Bin can actually save images, audio, documents, video, APK files, VCF cards, HTML pages, and just about anything you can accidentally delete except messages or contact information.

You can view the comprehensive list of files compatible with Dumpster here.
